BALANCE_NUMBER: The balance must be a number | El balance debe ser un número
CODE_LENGTH: The verification code must be exactly 6 characters long.
DESCRIPTION_REQUIRED: The description is required | La descripción es obligatoria
DESCRIPTION_STRING: The description must be a text string | La descripción debe ser una cadena de texto
EMAIL_INVALID: The email format is incorrect (e.g., user@domain.com).
FIRSTNAME_STRING: The first name must be a string.
LASTNAME_STRING: The last name must be a string.
PASSWORD_LOWERCASE: The password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH: The password must be between 8 and 20 characters.
PASSWORD_NUMBER: The password must contain at least one number.
PASSWORD_SPECIAL_CHAR: The password must contain at least one special character (@, $, !, %, *, ?, &).
PASSWORD_STRING: The password must be a string.
PASSWORD_UPPERCASE: The password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
RELATIONS_ARRAY: Relations must be an array | Las relaciones deben ser un arreglo
RELATIONS_INVALID: Only 'account' and 'debitCard' relations are allowed | Solo se permiten las relaciones 'account' y 'debitCard'
RELATIONS_UNIQUE: Duplicate relations are not allowed | No se permiten relaciones duplicadas
TITLE_REQUIRED: The title is required | El título es obligatorio
TITLE_STRING: The title must be a text string | El título debe ser una cadena de texto
TYPE_MOVEMENT_INVALID: The type of movement must be Wallet or Transfer | El tipo de movimiento debe ser Wallet o Transfer
